Function reference

All functions

conditionalSliderRangeInput()
Display a Point or Range Slider Based on a Trigger Input
ct_dist()
Calculate the Steady-State Joint Distribution for a Population
ct_nav_ext_link()
Add a Hyper-linked Item to a Navbar or Navbar Menu
ct_nav_pad()
Add Padding to a Navbar or Navbar Menu
ct_sum()
Summarize Joint Distribution from `ct_dist()`
ct_tooltip()
Add a tooltip to an HTML Element from `tags`
ct_undetected() ct_rr() ct_cost_eff()
Risk-Based Metrics
run_app()
Run the covidtest Application
ct_h1() ct_h2() ct_h3() ct_h4() ct_h5() ct_h6()
HTML Headers with tooltips
ct_pos() ct_neg() ct_true_pos() ct_false_pos() ct_true_neg() ct_false_neg() ct_ppv() ct_npv() ct_fdr() ct_for() ct_sens() ct_spec() ct_fnr() ct_fpr()
Testing Metrics
toggle_panel_server()
Handle a toggle panel in the Server
toggle_panel_ui()
Create a toggle panel in the UI
